sentences.en: After going over the Col de Vars, the route passes through St-Paul-sur-Ubaye.
sentences.cn: 这条道越过瓦尔山口之后，穿过于拜河畔圣保罗。
沿途两旁站着欢呼的人群。

sentences.en: Eighteen boats plied the 1,000 miles of river along a trading route.
sentences.cn: 18艘船沿着贸易航线往返于1,000英里的河面上。

sentences.en: He had to take a different route home.
I pulled out into the eastbound lane of Route 2.
sentences.cn: 我转入2号公路东向车道。

sentences.en: It is near where the pilgrimage route crosses the road to Quimper.
sentences.cn: 那儿离朝圣之路与通往坎佩尔的道路的交叉路口很近。

sentences.en: Stuart came into film-making via a circuitous route.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特费尽周折才最终开始电影制作。

sentences.en: Tens of thousands lined the route from Dublin airport.
sentences.cn: 从都柏林机场出来的道路两边站着数万人。

sentences.en: The bus had to deviate from its usual route because of a road closure.
sentences.cn: 因为道路封闭，公共汽车只得绕道而行。

sentences.en: The cabdriver took them on a circuitous route to the police station.
sentences.cn: 出租车司机载着他们绕了个大圈才到警察局。

sentences.en: The coastal path is a popular route for walkers.
sentences.cn: 这条海滨小路是散步者很喜欢走的路径。

sentences.en: They would go out on his route and check him.
sentences.cn: 他们会到他那里走访一下，看看他的情况。

sentences.en: This is not the most direct route to Wangjiazhuang Village.
sentences.cn: 到王家庄这么走不顺路.

sentences.en: To drive, go east on Route 9.
sentences.cn: 如果开车，在9号公路向东行驶。

sentences.en: Trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.cn: 火车正在运送过去由卡车运送的大批货物。

sentences.en: We stopped for a picnic en route.
sentences.cn: 我们在途中停下来野餐。

phrases.tran_cn: 默认路由；[电脑]一路径表格记录
直接航线（电工）；直线路线（航海）
迂回进路；脱险通道；疏散路线
航线图；过程图表，路线图表
线路测量；航线测量；路线测量

trans.tran_cn: 路，（公共汽车和列车等的）常规路线，航线，渠道，途径
trans.tran_en: a way from one place to another
to send something somewhere using a particular route

trans.tran_cn: 按某路线发送，给…规定路线[次序，程序]
